title: Coolest superhero group!
review: Count on the Avengers to make man-tights and capes look more fashionable than ever! With incredible fight choreography, it's hard not to be impressed.

title: Close to perfection
review: One of the nearly-flawless superhero movies we have and is a definite must-watch for all generations.

title: Just a couple of flaws
review: There are a couple of flaws with this film but I believe that they didn't entirely destroy the movie.

title: Shame for the God of Thunder
review: I personally think it's a step towards the wrong direction. I hope they don't let Thor end up a goofball.

title: Simply amazing
review: It's like reading a comic book and watching a movie at the same time! Indescribable!

title: Epic mix of emotions and fantasy
review: A great blend of action, adventure, humor, emotion, thrills and fiction - things you won't expect in a superhero film.

title: Epic ending!
review: I really love how it felt like everyone who survived 'the snap' felt that they lost somebody precious in their lives. It gives such a real sense of family.

title: Great action scenes!
review: Compared to the first Avengers, there's a lot of things that they improved on in this film. From the storytelling, to the much more defined fight choreography, it's definitely a step-up from the previous one.

title: Good story
review: Great superhero flick. I enjoyed it and even though the action scenes weren't on par with the other films, the great story made up for it.

title: This is not DC
review: Marvel should not have tried so hard to give Thor a darker tone. That's DC's job, not theirs.
